name: eco-marketplace
description: Eco Marketplace - B2B PCR Materials Platform

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../ecotrade && npm install
scripts.build: if [ -d 'ecotrade' ]; then cd ecotrade && npm install && npm run build && cd ..; fi && if [ -d 'server' ]; then cd server && npm install && cd ..; fi
scripts.start: if [ -d 'server' ]; then cd server && node server.js; else echo 'Error: server directory not found'; exit 1; fi
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd ecotrade && npm run dev"
